response.original_title: Ti Dete To Deto Te Detat Saglech Detat Shivya
response.overview: Shivya explores the life of a carefree and young Mumbai lad, who happens to use abusive language on a day-to-day basis. However, he plans on mending his ways after this habit of using foul language topples his life upside down.
response.tagline: Shivya explores the life of a carefree and young Mumbai lad, who happens to use abusive language on a day-to-day basis.
response.title: Ti Dete To Deto Te Detat Saglech Detat Shivya
